items.sentence: He stressed the convenient aspects of city life.
If it rains tomorrow, I'll stay at home all day.
Please remember to wake me up at seven tomorrow.
The problem is not so much the cost as the time.
If you're bored, I suggest you go to the cinema.
I found what I was looking for under Tom's desk.
Tom and Mary watched the meteor shower together.
You need to make sure that you're there on time.
Do you think that Tom will want to go with Mary?
I suggest you don't go to Australia this winter.
